effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Removes the effects of detect or protect from the target before hitting. This move cannot be copied by mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This attack hits a target using a move such as Protect or Detect. This also lifts the effects of those moves.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This attack hits a target using Protect. This also lifts the effects of the move.
